00017 Entity::Entity(Map* inMap) :
00018         map(inMap)
00019         ,size(12)
00020         ,destroyed(false)
00021         ,solid(false)
00022 {
00023         if (NULL != map)
00024         {
00025                 tile_w = map->Get_TileWidth();
00026                 tile_h = map->Get_TileHeight();
00027         }
00028         else {
00029                 tile_w = 32; // this should be 32x32, rather than 16x16
00030                 tile_h = 32;
00031         }
00032 
00033         movement_speed = 60.0;
00034         speed_boost = 0;
00035         
00036         animator.Set_animation("down");
00037 
00038         name = "UNSPECIFIED";
00039 }

00047 void Entity::Load(std::ifstream& data)
00048 {
00049         Attributes attributes;
00050 
00051         std::string line;
00052         while (seek_non_comment_line(data, line))
00053         {
00054                 if ("</entity>" == line)
00055                 {
00056                         /* Used to only need to type attribute name once: prevents typos */
00057                         std::string attributeName;
00058 
00059                         /* Specify the tile from the top-left of the map that the entity is
00060                          * standing on.  This aligns the entity to the top-left corner of
00061                          * the tile instead of the center.
00062                          */
00063                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find("tile_x") &&
00064                                 attributes.end() != attributes.find("tile_y"))
00065                         {
00066                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00067 
00068                                 attributeName = "tile_x";
00069                                 int tile_x = String_to_type<int>(attributes[attributeName]);
00070                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00071 
00072                                 attributeName = "tile_y";
00073                                 int tile_y = String_to_type<int>(attributes[attributeName]);
00074                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00075 
00076                                 float x = tile_w * tile_x - (tile_w / 2);
00077                                 float y = tile_h * tile_y - (tile_h / 2);
00078                                 Set_position(Vector(x, y));
00079                         }
00080 
00081                         /* Specify the tile from the top-left of the map that the entity is
00082                          * standing on.  The "c" at the end means to center the entity.
00083                          */
00084                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find("tile_xc") &&
00085                                 attributes.end() != attributes.find("tile_yc"))
00086                         {
00087                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00088 
00089                                 attributeName = "tile_xc";
00090                                 int tile_x = String_to_type<int>(attributes[attributeName]);
00091                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00092 
00093                                 attributeName = "tile_yc";
00094                                 int tile_y = String_to_type<int>(attributes[attributeName]);
00095                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00096 
00097                                 float x = tile_w * tile_x;
00098                                 float y = tile_h * tile_y;
00099                                 Set_position(Vector(x, y));
00100                         }
00101 
00102                         /* These are absolute coordinates on a map: designer needs to know
00103                          * the map's tile dimensions in order to line things up as expected.
00104                          */
00105                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find("x") &&
00106                                 attributes.end() != attributes.find("y"))
00107                         {
00108                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00109 
00110                                 attributeName = "x";
00111                                 float x = String_to_type<float>(attributes[attributeName]);
00112                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00113 
00114                                 attributeName = "y";
00115                                 float y = String_to_type<float>(attributes[attributeName]);
00116                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00117 
00118                                 Set_position(Vector(x, y));
00119                         }
00120 
00121                         attributeName = "interact";
00122                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00123                         {
00124                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00125 
00126                                 scripts[INTERACT] = attributes[attributeName];
00127                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00128                         }
00129 
00130                         attributeName = "pick_up";
00131                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00132                         {
00133                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00134 
00135                                 scripts[PICK_UP] = attributes[attributeName];
00136                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00137                         }
00138 
00139                         attributeName = "update";
00140                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00141                         {
00142                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00143 
00144                                 scripts[UPDATE] = attributes[attributeName];
00145                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00146                         }
00147 
00148                         attributeName = "attack";
00149                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00150                         {
00151                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00152 
00153                                 scripts[ATTACK] = attributes[attributeName];
00154                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00155                         }
00156 
00157                         attributeName = "solid";
00158                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00159                         {
00160                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00161 
00162                                 Set_solid("true" == attributes[attributeName]);
00163                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00164                         }
00165 
00166                         attributeName = "animations";
00167                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00168                         {
00169                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00170 
00171                                 Animations animations = Load_animations(attributes[attributeName], game->Get_resource_manager());
00172                                 Set_animations(animations);
00173                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00174                         }
00175 
00176                         attributeName = "name";
00177                         if (attributes.end() != attributes.find(attributeName))
00178                         {
00179                                 Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00180                                 Set_Name(attributes[attributeName]);
00181                                 attributes.erase(attributeName);
00182                         }
00183 
00184                         Show_attributes(std::cout, attributes);
00185                         //Any remaining attributes are meant for use in the lua scripts
00186                         for (Attributes::iterator i = attributes.begin(); i != attributes.end(); ++i)
00187                         {
00188                                 lua_State* state = game->Get_lua_wrapper().Prepare("Set_attribute", this);
00189                                 lua_pushlstring(state, i->first.c_str(), i->first.length());
00190                                 std::vector<std::string> tokens = tokenize(i->second, " \t");
00191 
00192                                 Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Token size: %d\n", tokens.size());
00193                                 for (u32 t = 0; t < tokens.size(); ++t)
00194                                 {
00195                                         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "  tokens[%d]: %s\n", t, tokens[t].c_str());
00196                                 }
00197 
00198                                 //Todo: Support other lua types
00199                                 size_t tokensSize = tokens.size() - 1;
00200                                 if (tokensSize > 0)
00201                                 {
00202                                         if ("string" == tokens[tokensSize])
00203                                         {
00204                                                 /* Everything between the equals sign and the word
00205                                                  * "string" will be the string, though the words will
00206                                                  * have to be reconstructed from a tokenized state.
00207                                                  * Don't have spaces in your string, since they will be
00208                                                  * removed:
00209                                                  *   name    =   gravy     boat   string
00210                                                  * becomes:
00211                                                  *   name = gravy boat string
00212                                                  * and the final string is:
00213                                                  *   gravy boat
00214                                                  */
00215                                                 std::string combined = tokens[0];
00216                                                 for (size_t i = 1; i < tokensSize; ++i)
00217                                                 {
00218                                                         combined = combined + " " + tokens[i];
00219                                                 }
00220                                                 lua_pushlstring(state, combined.c_str(), combined.length());
00221                                         }
00222                                         else if ("number" == tokens[tokensSize])
00223                                         {
00224                                                 lua_pushnumber(state, String_to_type<float>(tokens[0]));
00225                                         }
00226                                         else
00227                                         {
00228                                                 printlog(tokens[tokensSize] + " is not a supported lua type");
00229                                         }
00230                                 }
00231                                 game->Get_lua_wrapper().Call(2);
00232                         }
00233 
00234                         // Once the closing tag is found, do not scan the file any further.
00235                         break;
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 //Store name, value pair in attributes
00239                 std::string name;
00240                 std::vector<std::string> value;
00241 
00242                 /* Ensure that the line has a valid "name=value" pair, else we will
00243                  * see problems.
00244                  */
00245                 if (true == name_and_value(line, name, value))
00246                 {
00247                         /* Until we figure out how to have multiple values with the same
00248                          * name, we're only going to be able to take the first one...
00249                          */
00250                         attributes[name] = value[0];
00251                 }
00252                 else
00253                 {
00254                         /* If this fails, the line doesn't have a "name=value" pair.
00255                          * It's not an error we can't recover from, so this is where a
00256                          * warning can be displayed, if desired.
00257                          */
00258                 }
00259 
00260 //              log(name + " = " + value);
00261         }
00262 }

00288 
00289 void Entity::Set_movement(Vector idirection)
00290 {
00291 //      std::cout << "Movement: " << idirection.X() << " " << idirection.Y() << std::endl;
00292         direction = idirection;
00293 
00294         bool up = direction.Y()<0;
00295         bool down = direction.Y()>0;
00296         bool left = direction.X()<0;
00297         bool right = direction.X()>0;
00298 
00299         if ((down && !up) && (right != left))
00300                 animator.Set_animation("downright", left);
00301         else if ((up && !down) && (right != left))
00302                 animator.Set_animation("upright", left);
00303         else if (right != left)
00304                 animator.Set_animation("right", left);
00305         else if (!up && down)
00306                 animator.Set_animation("down");
00307         else if (up && !down)
00308                 animator.Set_animation("up");
00309 }

00336 void Entity::Set_script(std::string s, std::string f)
00337 {
00338         Script script;
00339         if ("PICK_UP" == s)
00340         {
00341                 script = PICK_UP;
00342         }
00343         else if ("INTERACT" == s)
00344         {
00345                 script = INTERACT;
00346         }
00347         else if ("ATTACK" == s)
00348         {
00349                 script = ATTACK;
00350         }
00351         else if ("UPDATE" == s)
00352         {
00353                 script = UPDATE;
00354         }
00355         else
00356         {
00357                 Monday_out(WARNING_LEVEL, std::cout, "*WARNING: Unrecognized script type: %s\n", s.c_str());
00358                 return;
00359         }
00360 
00361         scripts[script] = f;
00362 }

00365 bool Entity::Pick_up(Container* to)
00366 {
00367         lua_State* state = game->Get_lua_wrapper().Prepare(scripts[PICK_UP], this);
00368         if (!state || "" == scripts[PICK_UP])
00369         {
00370                 return false;
00371         }
00372         lua_pushlightuserdata(state, to);
00373         game->Get_lua_wrapper().Call(1);
00374         return true;
00375 }

00396 
00397 void Entity::Update(double dt)
00398 {
00399         lua_State* state = game->Get_lua_wrapper().Prepare(scripts[UPDATE], this);
00400         if (state)
00401         {
00402                 lua_pushnumber(state, dt);
00403                 game->Get_lua_wrapper().Call(1);
00404         }
00405 
00406         Vector newposition = position + direction * dt * (movement_speed + speed_boost);
00407         Collision_data collision_data;
00408         if (solid && game->Get_obstacle_manager().Circle_collision(newposition, size, collision_data, this))
00409         {
00410                 position = newposition + collision_data.adjust;
00411         }
00412         else
00413         {
00414                 position = newposition;
00415         }
00416         animator.Update(dt);
00417 }

00420 void Entity::Render(const Camera& camera)
00421 {
00422         Vector rpos = camera.Apply(position);
00423         animator.Render(rpos, 1);
00424         float x = rpos.X();
00425         float y = rpos.Y();
00426         al_draw_rectangle(x - size, y - size, x + size, y + size, al_map_rgb(100, 0, 0), 0);
00427 //      al_draw_circle(rpos.X(), rpos.Y(), 8, al_map_rgb(100, 0, 0), 0);
00428 }

00449 
00450 bool Entity::Circle_collision(const Vector& center, float radius, Collision_data& data)
00451 {
00452         Vector difference = center-position;
00453         float length = difference.Length();
00454         if (length < size+radius)
00455         {
00456                 data.obstacle = this;
00457                 difference.Normalize();
00458                 data.adjust = difference*(size+radius-length);
00459                 return true;
00460         }
00461         return false;
00462 }
00463 
00464 
00465 bool Entity::Point_blocked(const Vector& iposition)
00466 {
00467         if ((iposition-position).Length() < size)
00468                 return true;
00469         return false;
00470 }

00473 void Entity::Set_solid(const bool &isolid)
00474 {
00475         if (isolid == solid)
00476         {
00477                 return;
00478         }
00479         solid = isolid;
00480         if (solid)
00481         {
00482                 game->Get_obstacle_manager().Add_obstacle(this);
00483         }
00484         else
00485         {
00486                 game->Get_obstacle_manager().Remove_obstacle(this);
00487         }
00488 }

00522 /*
00523  * Lua bindings
00524 */
00525 int Entity_set_position(lua_State* state)
00526 {
00527         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00528 
00529         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00530         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00531         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00532 
00533         int x = lua_tonumber(state, 2);
00534         int y = lua_tonumber(state, 3);
00535         entity->Set_position(Vector(x, y));
00536 
00537         return 0;
00538 }

00540 
00541 int Entity_set_position_tile(lua_State* state)
00542 {
00543         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00544 
00545         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00546         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00547         Map* map = game->Get_map();
00548         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00549 
00550         /* Default values, should be overridden */
00551         int tilew = 32;
00552         int tileh = 32;
00553         if (NULL != map)
00554         {
00555                 tilew = map->Get_TileWidth();
00556                 tileh = map->Get_TileHeight();
00557         }
00558 
00559         int tilex = lua_tonumber(state, 2);
00560         int tiley = lua_tonumber(state, 3);
00561 
00562         /* Centers the entity within the tile */
00563         int x = (tilex * tilew + tilew / 2);
00564         int y = (tiley * tileh + tileh / 2);
00565 
00566         entity->Set_position(Vector(x, y));
00567 
00568         return 0;
00569 }

00571 
00572 int Entity_set_position_name(lua_State* state)
00573 {
00574         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00575         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00576         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00577         Map* map = game->Get_map();
00578         mon_assert(NULL != map && "Game returned a NULL map");
00579         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00580 
00581         std::string name = lua_tostring(state, 2);
00582         Entity* targetEntity = NULL;
00583 
00584         Entities entities = map->Get_entities();
00585         for (Entities::iterator it = entities.begin(); it != entities.end(); ++it)
00586         {
00587                 if (name == (*it)->Get_Name())
00588                 {
00589                         targetEntity = *it;
00590                         break;
00591                 }
00592         }
00593 
00594         if (NULL != targetEntity)
00595         {
00596                 Vector pos = targetEntity->Get_position();
00597                 entity->Set_position(pos);
00598         }
00599 
00600         return 0;
00601 }

00620 int Entity_get_position(lua_State* state)
00621 {

00623 
00624         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00625         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00626         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00627 
00628         Vector position = entity->Get_position();

00635 
00641 int Entity_get_position_tile(lua_State* state)
00642 {
00643         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00644 
00645         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00646         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00647         Map* map = game->Get_map();
00648         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00649         mon_assert(NULL != map);
00650 
00651         Vector position = entity->Get_position();
00652         float tilex = position.X() / map->Get_TileWidth();
00653         float tiley = position.Y() / map->Get_TileHeight();
00654         lua_pushnumber(state, tilex);
00655         lua_pushnumber(state, tiley);
00656 
00657         return 2;
00658 }

00722 
00723 void Entity_register_lua_callbacks(lua_State* state)
00724 {
00725         lua_register(state, "Entity_set_position", Entity_set_position);
00726         lua_register(state, "Entity_set_position_tile", Entity_set_position_tile);
00727         lua_register(state, "Entity_set_position_name", Entity_set_position_name);
00728         lua_register(state, "Entity_get_position", Entity_get_position);
00729         lua_register(state, "Entity_get_position_tile", Entity_get_position_tile);
00730         lua_register(state, "Entity_set_movement", Entity_set_movement);
00731         lua_register(state, "Entity_set_script", Entity_set_script);
